-C.value: try { Use-Icinga -Minimal; } catch { Write-Output 'The Icinga PowerShell Framework is either not installed on the system or not configured properly. Please check https://icinga.com/docs/windows for further details'; exit 3; }; Exit-IcingaExecutePlugin -Command 'Invoke-IcingaCheckHyperVOverCommitment'

16.description: Used to specify a WARNING threshold for the Hyper-V average Storage overcommitment.
16.caption: StorageOCPercentWarn

3.description: Include only virtual machines with a specific name. Supports wildcard usage (*)
3.caption: IncludeVms

5.description: Include only virtual machines that are currently running
5.caption: ActiveVms

18.description: Disables the performance data output of this plugin. Default to FALSE.
18.caption: NoPerfData

12.description: Used to specify a WARNING threshold for the Hyper-V average RAM overcommitment.
12.caption: RAMOCPercentWarn

10.description: Used to specify a WARNING threshold for the Hyper-V RAM overcommitment in Byte.
10.caption: RAMOCByteWarn

2.description: Change the value your defined threshold checks against from the current value to a collected time threshold of the Icinga for Windows daemon, as described here: https://icinga.com/docs/icinga-for-windows/latest/doc/service/10-Register-Service-Checks/ An example for this argument would be 1m or 15m which will use the average of 1m or 15m for monitoring.
2.caption: ThresholdValue

8.description: Warning threshold for Hyper-V average CPU overcommitment.
8.caption: CPUOCPercentWarn

17.description: Used to specify a CRITICAL threshold for the Hyper-V average Storage overcommitment.
17.caption: StorageOCPercentCrit

11.description: Used to specify a CRITICAL threshold for the Hyper-V RAM overcommitment in Byte.
11.caption: RAMOCByteCrit

9.description: Critical threshold for Hyper-V average CPU overcommitment.
9.caption: CPUOCPercentCrit

14.description: Used to specify a WARNING threshold for the Hyper-V Storage overcommitment in Byte.
14.caption: StorageOCByteWarn

7.description: Critical threshold for Hyper-V CPU Cores overcommitment.
7.caption: CPUCoreOCCrit

15.description: Used to specify a CRITICAL threshold for the Hyper-V Storage overcommitment in Byte.
15.caption: StorageOCByteCrit

6.description: Warning threshold for Hyper-V CPU Cores overcommitment.
6.caption: CPUCoreOCWarn

4.description: Exclude virtual machines with a specific name. Supports wildcard usage (*)
4.caption: ExcludeVms

19.description:
Changes the behavior of the plugin output which check states are printed:
0 (default): Only service checks/packages with state not OK will be printed
1: Only services with not OK will be printed including OK checks of affected check packages including Package config
2: Everything will be printed regardless of the check state
3: Identical to Verbose 2, but prints in addition the check package configuration e.g (All must be [OK])
19.caption: Verbosity

13.description: Used to specify a CRITICAL threshold for the Hyper-V average RAM overcommitment.
13.caption: RAMOCPercentCrit
